tool_description: Extraction of information from text/pdf/image document of Medical Report of a patient.
name: Document Insight
title: Document Insight

api_list.name: document_analysis
api_list.description: Provides structured information extracted from the pdf/image document of medical report.

api_list.name: upload_custom_ontology(CSV file)
api_list.description: Uploads user provided custom ontology file(CSV) to use along with default UMLS.
